title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Friday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Friday

This Friday, you can really shop and save. (Photo: L.O.L. Surprise / Anker)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Good news: Friday is finally here. As you count down the hours until you're home free and ready to enjoy your second to last weekend in October (my advice: carve pumpkins ASAP), this is also a great time to look for deals.

Amazon is already heating up as the holiday season slowly creeps up, meaning the site is beginning to really roll out the big, impressive deals on stuff you just know is going to win around the holidays. From the season's best toys to weighted blankets and more, these are the five best Amazon deals you don't want to miss today.

1. Save up to 65% on L.O.L. Surprise!

Surprise—here's the best deal of the day for parents. (Photo: LOL Surprise)

Already looking for the perfect stocking stuffers? You can get a jumpstart on your holiday gift shopping and save up to 65% on a variety of L.O.L Surprise! products as part of Amazon's daily deal for today. From this popular two-pack of L.O.L. Surprise! Pets to these L.O.L. Surprise Hairgoals Makeover Series dolls, these toys are some of the hottest of the season and you can beat the Black Friday crowds by grabbing them up now while they're at such a good discount. This deal is only good for today, so you should definitely act fast.

Save up to 65% on select L.O.L.! Surprise Pets on Amazon

2. Save $20: This waterproof speaker by Anker at its lowest price yet

Party like it's 1999 with this speaker. (Photo: Anker)

A good portable speaker can make such a difference, and right now, you can grab a great one—the Anker Soundcore Flare Mini—on sale for its lowest price ever. While we haven't tested this speaker directly, we were big fans of the Anker Soundcore Flare+ and found it to be one of the best waterproof Bluetooth speakers we've ever tried. In addition to incredible sound, this waterproof speaker also lights up and comes with eight individual LEDs and 5 lighting modes, so you can customize your dream party. It usually goes for $50, so grab it now while you can.

Get the Anker Soundcore Flare Mini Bluetooth Speaker for $29.99 (Save $20)

3. Lowest price alert: This deep-kneading foot massager

This massager can relax tired feet. (Photo: Mynt)

Feeling tired and sore after a long day on your feet? Right now, you can get this deep-kneading foot massager from Mynt for just $130 when you use an on-page 10% off discount and use the promo code CYMFACTM. This is the lowest price we've ever seen for this massager and will save you $50 on it. Reviewers on Amazon say this definitely isn't your average foot vibrating massage machine—several report that it feels just like you're getting an actual foot massage, but right at home.

Get the Mynt Shiatsu Foot Massager with Deep-Kneading on Amazon for $130 with promo code CYMFACTM (Save $50)

4. Under $100: This cult-favorite facial cleansing brush

Rejoice, this cult-favorite facial cleansing brush is finally on sale. (Photo: Foreo)

Beauty lovers, take notice: you can finally get the FOREO LUNA Mini 2 on sale for once. This cult-favorite cleansing brush is a favorite with beauty experts and influencers alike, since uses T-Sonic pulsations to cleanse deep below the skin's surface. It comes with eight different adjustable intensities and works for all skin types. Even better? It's designed to remove up to 99.5% of all dirt and oil, and dead skin cells, while also unclogging pores and removing makeup residue. This deal—which is only good on the mint, fuchsia, and pearl pink models—is one of the best we've ever seen for this brush. If you're wondering what to get that beauty-obsessed daughter, sister, aunt, or friend in your life, this is a great option.

Get the FOREO LUNA Mini 2 Facial Cleansing Brush for $97 (Save $41.70)

5. Up to $25 off: An affordable weighted blanket

It's a big hug in blanket form. (Photo: YnM)

Nothing says fall like bundling up under the covers, but weighted blankets take that experience one step further, since they basically feel like you're getting one giant bear hug. The YnM Weighted Blanket is our favorite affordable weighted blanket because although it's not the soft weighted blanket, it performs well for its price, and right now you can save up to $25 on it by clipping an on-page coupon. You may want to get a soft duvet cover with it with all that extra cash you're saving.

Get the YnM Weighted Blanket (Twin, 12lb) starting at $49.90 (Save $15-$25)

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
